function.name: extract_microwave_features
function.description: Extract key microwave specifications from Google search results.

capacity.description: Internal capacity of the microwave in liters. Example: 20, 25, 30, 34, 36.

technology.description: The heating/operational technology of the microwave.

smart.description: Whether the microwave supports Wi-Fi, mobile app, voice assistant, IoT or smart features.
